data.title: 0 The Hodological
data.meta_description: 0 the hodological - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Kurt Lewin was a pioneering German-American psychologist known for his work in social, organizational, and applied psychology. He studied under Carl Stumpf at the University of Berlin and was influenced by Stumpf's emphasis on empirical research and phenomenology. Lewin later made important contributions to the fields of group dynamics and organizational development. He defined himself through applied research, action research, and group communication.
